directions: Stir peaches, water, milk, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt together in a microwave-safe bowl.
Cook in microwave on High, stirring every 60 seconds, until the oats are softened, about 3 minutes. Stir one final time before serving.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
title: Peachy Oatmeal
